bug.author: pashminacameron
bug.description:
Is this a class for managing Gloo settings or Nccl settings? Documentation refers to Gloo, but the class name is Nccl. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: a45b7359-e799-3511-8da3-825fe92b469e Version Independent ID: 9f90199b-d892-e2a2-f075-6a29462c3969 Content: azureml.train.dnn.Nccl class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-train-core/azureml.train.dnn.Nccl.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pashminacameron>@pashminacameron</denchmark-link> Thanks for the feedback. We are actively investigating and will get back to you soon.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pashminacameron>@pashminacameron</denchmark-link> I have updated document and fixed the typo. Thanks for the feedback. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/j-martens>@j-martens</denchmark-link> please review the PR.
We addressed the bug in the docstring. Fix will appear in next release 1-2 weeks. Thanks.
